text: FK Omladinac Novi Banovci () is a football club based in Novi Banovci, Vojvodina, Serbia. They currently compete in the Serbian League Vojvodina, the third level of the national league system. ==History== The first football game in Novi Banovci was held on 1 September 1947, which is considered to be the club's foundation date. They spent six seasons in the fourth tier of Serbian football, before earning promotion to the Serbian League Vojvodina in 2015. ==Honours== Novi Sad-Syrmia Zone League (Tier 4) * 2014–15 ==Seasons== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="9"|League !rowspan="2" width="100"|Cup |- !Division !width="20"|P !width="20"|W !width="20"|D !width="20"|L !width="20"|F !width="20"|A !width="20"|Pts !width="20"|Pos |- |2010–11 |4 – Vojvodina West |30||11||8||11||58||50||41||8th |— |- |2011–12 |4 – Vojvodina West |30||12||9||9||34||28||45||7th |— |- |2012–13 |4 – Vojvodina West |30||11||6||13||35||36||39||9th |— |- |2013–14 |4 – Vojvodina West |28||15||6||7||44||23||51||3rd |— |- |2014–15 |4 – Novi Sad-Syrmia |30||22||1||7||62||26||67||style="background-color:#DFD"|1st |— |- |2015–16 |3 – Vojvodina |30||8||11||11||31||34||35||13th |— |- |2016–17 |3 – Vojvodina |28||19||3||6||52||28||60||2nd |— |- |2017–18 |3 – Vojvodina |30||13||5||12||49||38||44||7th |— |- |2018–19 |3 – Vojvodina |32||16||4||12||38||34||52||3rd |— |} ==Managerial history== * Goran Dragoljić * Dragan Stevanović ==References== ==External links== * * Club page at Srbijasport * Club page at Srbijafudbal Category:1947 establishments in Serbia Category:Association football clubs established in 1947 Category:Football clubs in Serbia Category:Football clubs in Vojvodina
